home.heroTitle: ClickMore - Changing Clicks into Business Opportunities
home.heroTextDescription: Welcome to ClickMore. We are your trusted partner in achieving practicality, quality, and innovation in the digital world. If you're ready to take your business to the next level, you're in the right place. We're here to present innovative solutions that exceed expectations, attract attention to your brand, and drive business growth.

section-define-us.title: Defining Us - Our Vision
section-define-us.textDescription: Our goal is to provide companies with practical and high-quality work. We have a trained team that delivers the best performance to help solve problems. This drives us to constantly innovate and provide the best solutions to the market.

section-services.title: Digital Services
section-services.textDescription: From innovative solutions to innovative strategies, we create success through customized, dynamic products. Let's explore infinite possibilities together.

cardAdsense.title: ClickAdsense
cardAdsense.textDescription: Enhance your online presence, captivate viewers, and ensure that your brand is the first choice.

cardMedia.title: ClickMedia
cardMedia.textDescription: No more worries about social media. We'll take care of it for you.

cardPages.title: ClickPages
cardPages.textDescription: The best way to get more emails, launch products, and advertise services.

cardWeb.title: ClickWeb
cardWeb.textDescription: Your long-awaited website is possible here.

area-video.phraseDescription: A new way to hire a marketing agency for your company

section-ourMission.title: Negotiation Transparency
section-ourMission.textDescription: ClickMore is not just an agency. We are your growth partner. Personalized services and strategies tailored to your needs ensure that small and medium-sized enterprises achieve great results. Practicality, quality, innovation. ClickMore is here.

contact-information.title: Contact Information
contact-information.textDescription: Need help evaluating a challenging situation? Or have other questions? Feel free to contact us. We're happy to help.
